column2: Many horrors live in the peaks of the Dark Lands, none more vile than those that reside at Ash Ridge. Still, its precious minerals are worth every soul spared.
Within the Dark Hold is a sprawling dungeon so large it would take days to traverse and a lifetime to learn to navigate its claustrophobic passageways.
The Fortress of Vorag was built by enslaved Chaos Dwarfs and Goblins. As such only could the Dawi-Zharr find the secret chamber of the Ghoul King Vorag Bloodytooth and the secrets it held.

The nearest route from the Wolf Lands to the Plain of Bones and beyond. The slave traders that travel to Mingol Zharr-Naggrund, the capital city of the Dawi-Zharr, have made this a lucrative location.

A vast, jagged citadel stained black by the volcanic fires of the rocky plateau on which it sits. It aids the escort of far-flung slave caravans through the Howling Wastes and stands as a bulwark against frequent invasions from across River Ruin in the east.
This was clearly no mere workshop of Vorag's, macabre contraptions once dusty and broken, reforged in all their glory now feed us with incredible power.
